title: Peter Green Splinter Group - Hot Foot Powder (2000) [FLAC]
description:
Peter Green's interpretation of 13 classic Robert Johnson songs with some high class support: Dr. John, Otis Rush, Buddy Guy, Hubert Sumlin, Honeyboy Edwards & Joe Louis Walker


Peter Green Splinter Group With Nigel Watson - Hot Foot Powder
Label: Snapper Music - SMACD828
Format: CD, Album
Country: UK
Released: 2000
Genre: Blues
Style: Delta Blues, Acoustic Blues, Modern Electric Blues

8 	Traveling Riverside Blues 	
9 	Malted Milk 	
10 	Milkcow's Calf Blues 	
11 	Drunken Hearted Man 	
12 	Cross Road Blues 	
13 	Come On In My Kitchen
